title: U.N. in the classroom
creator_credit: Don Haldane, Julian Biggs and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: With minimum supervision from their teacher, seventh-grade school children conduct a model classroom assembly, patterned after a session of the United Nations, and debate an issue. The film demonstrates an original approach in helping children get to know the world they live in.
